amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish a task force to analyze and assess the Aliso Canyon natural gas leak.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3194 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3194 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S482-484; text as modified: CR S483-484) To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish a task force to analyze and assess the Aliso Canyon natural gas leak.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3194 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3194 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
